code: import*as Actions from"./actions";import initialState from"../store/initialState";export const ItemsReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState.items;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case Actions.FETCH_ITEM:return{...state,list:action.payload};default:return state;}};
